Hi,

we are thinking about harvesting to WARCs. We are currently using H1 b=
ut will be switching to H3 later this year. We are curious about two things=
 related to writing metadata in WARC:

1.	do H1 and H3 write metadata in WA=
RC in the same way (meaning will the metadata coming from each of them the =
same)?
2.	is the default way of writing of metadata in WARC in both H1 and =
H3 fixed or is there (an easy) way to customize it and how?

Thanks,

rudol=
f
